participant_1.background:
I'm afraid of losing my cats.
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, where I learned to love ice cream.
I have to balance my work and studies, and it can be very challenging.
I love to swim in the lake, even if it makes me a weirdo.
I procrastinate on chores because I'd rather spend time with my pets.

participant_2.background:
I've never been to a fortune teller, but I'm curious what they'd have to say about my life as a tiger.
My memories of my family are the most valuable thing I own.
I ride my bicycle to work.
I'm a couch potato who loves Jimmy Fallon and the Raptors.
i visit comic con.

content.text: Hi there! What do you think of fortune tellers?
I've never been to one, but I'm curious what they'd have to say about my life as a tiger.
Haha I'm not sure I believe in them, but I'm also curious what they would say about me.
I used to love to watch Jimmy Fallon when he had The Tonight Show, but I haven't watched it since he left.
Same! I was so sad when he left, but I still watch his YouTube clips sometimes.
I'm a big fan of the Raptors, and I go to Comic Con every year.
Oh, I've never been to Comic Con. I've heard it's a lot of fun.
It is! I love seeing all the costumes and meeting people who are passionate about the same things I am.
I'm glad you have some fun things that you enjoy doing.
Me too! I try to make the most of my time.
It sounds like you do. I'm impressed by how much you seem to get done.
Thank you! I like to stay busy.
I'm the same way. I like to have a lot going on
